Content.Text:
Today is Allen's birthday. Cook him
something nice and celebrate with him.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, what's up? You looking for me?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I see. You want to celebrate my birthday
with me? Great, I'll happily let you do
that.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow, you prepared all this? Great work,
<MYNAME>. Worthy of my praise.
<PAGE>
So let's eat, already. It looks
fantastic.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
That tasted great. Thanks so much for
the treat, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
My cute Princess, look at all the
trouble you went to for me.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I love you, Princess. You truly are a
fine women. I don't think I'll ever be
able to let you go.

Today is Rod's birthday. Cook him
something nice and celebrate with him.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, there you are. Something up?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You want to celebrate my birthday? Wow,
thanks! I'm so happy, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Woah! This all looks wonderful! 
<PAGE>
I don't want it to get cold so let's
dig in right away.

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, that was delicious. I don't
think I've ever tasted anything so
good!
<PAGE>
I'm so happy, I can't stop grinning! I'm
so very happy!

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>, I love you. Thinking how well
you treat me, it almost makes me want to
cry!
<PAGE>
I hope we can celebrate like this again
next year.

Today is Soseki's birthday. Cook him
something nice and celebrate with him.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Nice to see you. What's up?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hah hah, you want to celebrate my
birthday? I've had plenty of them, but
okay, sure! I'd love to.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, you made all of this?
<PAGE>
I'll be sure to give you plenty of
feedback. Let's eat!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, that was delicious. I'm
stuffed.
<PAGE>
It feels like ages since I last ate
food that was so lovingly prepared!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I never thought I'd be so happy to
celebrate another birthday, at my age!
<PAGE>
I love you, <MYNAME>.

Today is Sanjay's birthday. Cook him
something nice and celebrate with him.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome, <MYNAME>. What can I do for you?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You want to celebrate my birthday?
Thank you very much.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This all looks delicious. It's making me
quite hungry!
<PAGE>
No more talk. Let's eat!

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, thank you for the food. That was
perhaps the best meal ever!
<PAGE>
I could taste your love... and it was
totally delicious.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
I'm so happy, I don't think I'll be able
to sleep tonight.
<PAGE>
I'm so bursting with emotion I don't
know what to say! I love you, <MYNAME>.

Today is Neil's birthday. Cook him
something nice and celebrate with him.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. You need me or something?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Could it be... you want to celebrate
my birthday with me?
<PAGE>
T-Thanks!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Looks at this spread! It all looks
wonderful!
<PAGE>
Almost seems a waste to eat it. Almost!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, that was wonderful. So good!
<PAGE>
I was so happy, I think I ate a little
too much! I couldn't eat another
mouthful!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
Birthdays are great, aren't they? I
never felt like this before we started
dating.
<PAGE>
We'll do this again next year, right?
Then I'll have a special day to look
forward to all year!

Today is Amir's birthday. Cook him
something nice and celebrate with him.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hi, <MYNAME>. What's up?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
You want to celebrate my birthday?
<MYNAME>, I'm so happy. Thank you so much!

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
This all looks so good! I don't know
what to start with!
<PAGE>
We need to eat before it gets cold!
Let's get started!

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That was delicious, <MYNAME>. So good!
<PAGE>
Your cooking has warmed my heart!

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I really enjoyed celebrating my
birthday with you.
<PAGE>
I love you, <MYNAME>. I hope I can share
this day with you again next year.

Today is Tina's birthday. Cook her
something nice and celebrate with her.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, hello! Do you need something?

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, could it be... you're here to
celebrate my birthday with me? Thank
you, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wowee! Look at all of this! All these
dishes look so good!
<PAGE>
Let's get started! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Phew... that was delicious! I think I
ate too much!
<PAGE>
That was delicious, <MYNAME>. I'm so
happy!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
You did all of this for me!
<PAGE>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. I love you.

Today is Michelle's birthday. Cook her
something nice and celebrate with her.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>. good evening! <RED>∀</RED> What brings you
around so suddenly?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow! You're here to celebrate my
birthday? Thank you, <MYNAME>!  <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow! This all looks so delicious!
<PAGE>
Let's eat before it goes cold.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Phew. That was so good! I can't
quite believe it! <RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
I'm so glad that you came and celebrated
with me, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, <MYNAME>... I love you. <RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
I hope you'll be by my side next year,
too! Promise me?

Today is Yuri's birthday. Cook her
something nice and celebrate with her.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
...<MYNAME>, I'm so happy to see you. Any
reason for your visit?

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
You want to celebrate my birthday...?
I'm so happy! Thank you.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
...Incredible! It looks much better than
anything I can make!
<PAGE>
...Shall we eat, then?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
...That was delicious. Thank you.
<PAGE>
I think maybe I ate too much... But it
was really good!

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
...I love you, <MYNAME>. This was my best
birthday ever...! Thank you.

Today is Iroha's birthday. Cook her
something nice and celebrate with her.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome, <MYNAME>. Can I help you?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Y-You want to celebrate my birthday?
Thank you very much, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You made all of this, for me? I'm so
touched!
<PAGE>
Let's eat before it gets cold.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
That was delicious, <MYNAME>. Really,
really delicious!
<PAGE>
I've never experienced such a warm and
loving celebration.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
I'm so happy at spending this time with
you, I could cry!
<PAGE>
I love you, <MYNAME>. Thank you so much.

Today is Felicity's birthday. Cook her
something nice and celebrate with her.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, I'm so glad to see you. Can
I help you with something?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh yes! <RED>∀</RED> Go right ahead and celebrate
my birthday!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
All of this is for me? It all looks so
delicious! I'm so happy, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Without any further ado, let's eat!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, that was delicious!
<PAGE>
So very very good! <RED>∀</RED> I'm so happy.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>, thank you for my happiest
birthday ever.
<PAGE>
I l-l-love you. Please stay with me
forever!

Today is Witch Princess' birthday. Cook
her something nice and celebrate with
her.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, my little <MYNAME>. What's up?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
You want to celebrate my birthday?
You're such a sweet little thing.
Thank you.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, this all looks wonderful. You must
have worked quite hard!
<PAGE>
Let's eat before it gets cold, then!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That was delicious. Thank you so much,
<MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
It was exactly how I like it. You get
top marks from me!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. I love you.
Happy birthday, Allen. I love you!
Happy birthday, Rod. I love you!
Happy birthday, Soseki. I love you!
Happy birthday, Sanjay. I love you!
Happy birthday, Neil. I love you!
Happy birthday, Amir. I love you!
Happy birthday, Tina. I love you!
Happy birthday, Michelle. I love you!
Happy birthday, Yuri. I love you!
Happy birthday, Iroha. I love you!
Happy birthday, Felicity. I love you!

Happy birthday, Witch Princess. I love
you!
